  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(String savePath, int port) throws IOException
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      savePath - Path where to find and store the games.
      port - The port on which the server has to listen for connections.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if there is an error while processing files.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      The main server method, it runs the Server instance as a parallel thread, managing the new connection requests from the clients.

    • loadGames

      private void loadGames() throws IOException
      Loads the previous games from the disk.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if there is an error while processing files.

    • loadGame

      private void loadGame(com.google.gson.JsonObject json)
      Creates all the required data structures for a specific game.
      Parameters:
      json - Json object which contains all the required information to restore the game.

    • addGame

      public String addGame(int expectedPlayers, boolean expertMode)
      Adds a new game to the list of games.
      Parameters:
      expectedPlayers - Number of players expected to play the game.
      expertMode - Tells if the desired game has to be played in expert mode.
      Returns:
      The string of the newly created game.

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame(String id)
      Removes a game from the map. This method has to be called when the game ends.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the game to remove.

    • getNewId

      private String getNewId()
      Generates a random identifier for a new game.
      Returns:
      The generated identifier.

    • findGame

      public GameController findGame(String id)
      Gets the GameController associated with a specific game identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The game identifier.
      Returns:
      GameController associated with a specific game identifier.

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Returns true if the server process is currently running.
      Returns:
      The processRunning attribute.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Closes the server process and saves the games.
